Texts.Eng: Congratulations, Keffrider! Your Keff is now ready to be summoned at any time, so go and ride, my friend!

That ^orange;Vehicle Jumpgate^white; can transport your Keff from your ship's cargo hold to the field, but it's useless if you can't remotely control it. ^green;Build yourself a ^orange;Jumpgate Controller^green; using the ^orange;Avikan Transmitter^green; I gave you^white;, and you'll be ready to ride your very own Keff!
